item.description:
What a wonderful group we are continuing to have.
It is staying at about 11 per Meet Up.
Missed lots of oldies but all the newbies came back - A*W*E*S*O*M*E .

Don't forget, if you do have cribbage boards, we need them for our Meet Up :)

Thoroughly enjoyed playing with all the newbies and didn't get skunked (almost by Ed tho) :(

Enjoy the rest of February and see y'all in March :)
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the Back Room with our Cribbage Boards Out :)
item.name: Waltham Cribbage Meet Up and Welcome to the Ides of March
